text: REALITY TV GIFS Dance Moms star Abby Lee Miller was sentenced to a year ( and a day, just for kicks ) in jail last May after being convicted of bankruptcy fraud and bringing money into the U. S. illegally. She began her stint in the Victorville Federal Correctional Institution in California last July â€” and spoke out in a Dance Moms : Abby Tells All special airing just beforehand, worrying that she ` ` probably won't survive'' her time behind bars. But it's OK, she did! Despite many a salacious tabloid rumor otherwise, Miller is said to have bonded with her fellow inmates, took real estate classes, and earned a ` ` personal finance class diploma,'' which seems in particular like a good idea given, you know,
